column17:
This pair of shoes by Salomon comes as a complete solution to your casual as well as sports needs. The uppers look racy in its black and red colour combination. Crafted from faux leather with pores across the midfoot these shoes help reduce the sweat factor. The interiors have cushy collars and flexible midsole which gives you utmost comfort on the go. The outsole is durable which offers traction and stability on the go.

Features
  • Brand: Salomon
  • Colour: Red Black
  • Style: Laced
  • Usage: Casual

Style it with denims and tees to accentuate your look.

Care Tips
Gently brush away dust or dirt using a soft cleaning brush.
You can also use a dry soft sponge or hand towel to restore surface.
